original_text: Abraham got up early the next morning. He made his donkey ready for the journey. He took two servants with him, and also his son Isaac. First, he cut wood for the fire to make the burnt offering. Then he started on his journey to the place that God had told him.
korean_text: 아브라함이 아침에 일찍이 일어나 나귀에 안장을 지우고 두 종과 그의 아들 이삭을 데리고 번제에 쓸 나무를 쪼개어 가지고 떠나 하나님이 자기에게 일러 주신 곳으로 가더니

sentences.original_text: Abraham got up early the next morning
sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함은 다음 날 아침 일찍 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: He made his donkey ready for the journey
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여행을 위해 그의 나귀를 준비했습니다

sentences.original_text: He took two servants with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두 명의 종을 데리고 갔습니다
그리고 그의 아들 이삭도 함께 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: First, he cut wood for the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 먼저, 그는 불을 위한 장작을 잘랐습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he started on his journey
to the place that God had told him
